prompts.name: patient_name
prompts.label: What is the child's name?

prompts.name: patient_age
prompts.label: How old is the child? (months)

prompts.name: patient_weight
prompts.label: How much does the child weigh? (kg)

prompts.name: initial_visit
prompts.label: Initial visit?

prompts.name: drink
prompts.label: Is the child able to drink or breastfeed?

prompts.name: vomit
prompts.label: Does the child vomit everything?

prompts.name: convulsions
prompts.label: Has the child had convulsions?

prompts.name: cough
prompts.label: Does the child have a cough or have difficulty breathing?

prompts.name: diarrhea
prompts.label: Does the child have diarrhea?

prompts.name: measles
prompts.label: Has the child had measles in the last three months?

prompts.name: fever
prompts.label: Does the child have a fever?

prompts.name: cough_days
prompts.label: How long has the child had a cough? (days)

prompts.name: breath_rate
prompts.label: How many breaths does the child take in one minute?

prompts.name: indraw_stridor_wheezing
prompts.label: Does thie child show chest indrawing, stridor, or wheezing?

prompts.name: diarrhea_days
prompts.label: How long has the child had diarrhea? (days)

prompts.name: diarrhea_blood
prompts.label: Is there blood in the stool?

prompts.name: diarrhea_lethargic
prompts.label: Is the child lethargic or unconscnious?

prompts.name: diarrhea_restless
prompts.label: Is the child restless and irritable?

prompts.name: diarrhea_drink_properly
prompts.label: Offer the child fluids, are they able to drink properly?

prompts.name: diarrhea_thirsty
prompts.label: Does the child drink eagerly, seem very thirsty?

prompts.name: diarrhea_pinch
prompts.label: Pinch the child's skin, does the pinch go back very slowly?

prompts.name: diarrhea_sunken_eyes
prompts.label: Does the child have sunken eyes?

prompts.name: malaria_risk
prompts.label: Are you in an area at high risk for malaia?

prompts.name: fever_days
prompts.label: How long has the child had a fever? (days)

prompts.name: fever_persistent
prompts.label: Has fever been present every day?

prompts.name: measles_before
prompts.label: Has the child had measles within the last 3 months?

prompts.name: measles_stiffneck
prompts.label: Does the child have a stiff neck?

prompts.name: measles_signs
prompts.label: Does the child have a rash, runny nose, and/or red eyes?

prompts.name: measles_ulcers
prompts.label: Does the child have mouth ulcers?

prompts.name: measles_eyedischarge
prompts.label: Does the child have pus draining from his/her eye?

prompts.name: measles_eyeclouding
prompts.label: Are the child's eyes cloudy?

prompts.name: ear_problem
prompts.label: Does the child have an ear problem?

prompts.name: ear_pain
prompts.label: Is there an ear pain?

prompts.name: ear_tender
prompts.label: Is there tender swelling behind the ear?

prompts.name: ear_discharge
prompts.label: Is there an ear discharge?

prompts.name: malnut_wasting
prompts.label: Is the child visibly wasting?

prompts.name: malnut_oedema
prompts.label: Does the show oedema of both feet?

prompts.name: malnut_lowweight
prompts.label: Is the child's weight low for his/her age?

prompts.name: anemia_pallor
prompts.label: Does the child have palmar pallor?

prompts.name: pallor_severity
prompts.label: Is the palmar pallor severe?

prompts.name: treatment_intro
prompts.label: We are sorry that your child is sick. Based on your answers, we recommend the following treatments:

prompts.name: treat_now
prompts.label: Immediate Action:

prompts.name: References
prompts.label: Follow-Up:

calculates.name: severe_classification
calculates.calculation: calculates.general_danger_level() == "Severe" || calculates.high_danger_malaria() == "danger" || calculates.high_danger_pneumonia() == "danger" || calculates.high_danger_diarrhea() == "danger" || calculates.high_danger_malaria() == "danger"|| calculates.high_danger_measles() == "danger" || calculates.high_danger_ear() == "danger" || calculates.high_danger_malnut() == "danger" || calculates.high_danger_anemia() == "danger" ? "danger" : "good"

calculates.name: danger_class_see_dr
calculates.calculation: calculates.general_danger_level() == "Present" || calculates.high_danger_malaria() == "danger" || calculates.high_danger_measles() == "danger" || calculates.high_danger_pneumonia() == "danger" || calculates.high_danger_diarrhea() == "danger" || calculates.high_danger_ear() =="danger" || calculates.high_danger_malnut() == "danger" || calculates.high_danger_anemia() == "danger" ? "danger" : "good"

calculates.name: med_danger_dehydration
calculates.calculation: (calculates.has_diarrhea() && calculates.high_danger_dehydration() == "good" && (calculates.restless_and_sunken() || calculates.restless_and_thirsty() || calculates.restless_and_slow_pinch() || calculates.sunken_and_thirsty() || calculates.sunken_and_slow_pinch() || calculates.thirsty_and_slow_pinch())) ? "danger" : "good"

treat_now_options.name: go_to_clinic
treat_now_options.label: Refer URGENTLY to hospital

treat_now_options.name: malaria_high
treat_now_options.label: Give Quinine for severe Malaria (first dose)
treat_now_options.display_subtext: due to very severe febrile disease

treat_now_options.name: malaria_high2
treat_now_options.label: Give first dose of an appropriate antibiotic
treat_now_options.display_subtext: due to very severe febrile disease

treat_now_options.name: malaria_high3
treat_now_options.label: Treat child to prevent low blood sugar
treat_now_options.display_subtext: due to very severe febrile disease

treat_now_options.name: malaria_high4
treat_now_options.label: Give one dose of paracetamol in clinic for high fever (38.5 C or above)
treat_now_options.display_subtext: due to very severe febrile disease

treat_now_options.name: malaria_med
treat_now_options.label: Give oral co-artemeter or other antimalarial

treat_now_options.name: measles_high
treat_now_options.label: Give Vitamin A treatment

treat_now_options.name: measles_high3
treat_now_options.label: If clouding of the cornea or pus draining from the eye, apply tetracycline eye ointment

treat_now_options.name: measles_med
treat_now_options.label: Give Vitamin A treatment
treat_now_options.display_subtext: due to measles with eye or mouth complications

treat_now_options.name: measles_med2
treat_now_options.label: If pus draining from the eye, treat eye infection with tetracycline eye ointment
treat_now_options.display_subtext: due to measles with eye or mouth complications

treat_now_options.name: pneumonia_med
treat_now_options.label: Give oral antibiotic for 3 days

treat_now_options.name: dehydration_high_only
treat_now_options.label: Give fluid for severe dehydration

treat_now_options.name: dehydration_high
treat_now_options.label: Give frequent sips of ORS

treat_now_options.name: dehydration_high2
treat_now_options.label: Advise mother to continue to breastfeed

treat_now_options.name: dehydration_high3
treat_now_options.label: If child is 2 years or older and cholera is in your area, give antibiotics for cholera

treat_now_options.name: dehydration_med_only
treat_now_options.label: Med Danger Dehydration Only

treat_now_options.name: dehydration_med
treat_now_options.label: Give frequent sips of ORS

treat_now_options.name: dehydration_med2
treat_now_options.label: Advise mother to continue to breastfeed

treat_now_options.name: diarrhea_high
treat_now_options.label: Treat dehydration before referral unless the child has another severe classification

treat_now_options.name: dysentry
treat_now_options.label: Give ciprofloxacin for 3 days

treat_now_options.name: ear_high2
treat_now_options.label: Give first dose of paracetamol for pain

treat_now_options.name: ear_med
treat_now_options.label: Give an antibiotic for 5 days.

treat_now_options.name: malnut_high
treat_now_options.label: Treat the child to prevent low sugar

treat_now_options.name: no_treat_now
treat_now_options.label: None of your child's ailments require immediate action.
treat_now_options.danger: {{calculates.danger_class_see_dr() != "danger" && calculates.high_danger_malaria() != "danger" && calculates.med_danger_malaria() != "danger" && calculates.low_danger_malaria() != "danger" && calculates.high_danger_measles() != "danger" && calculates.med_danger_measles() != "danger" && calculates.high_danger_pneumonia() != "danger" && calculates.med_danger_pneumonia() != "danger" && (calculates.high_danger_dehydration() != "danger" || calculates.severe_classification() != "good") && (calculates.med_danger_dehydration() != "danger" || calculates.severe_classification() != "good") && calculates.high_danger_diarrhea() != "danger" && calculates.danger_dysentry() != "danger" && calculates.high_danger_ear() != "danger" && calculates.med_danger_ear() != "danger" && calculates.high_danger_malnut() != "danger" ? "danger" : "good"}}

follow_up.name: diarrhea
follow_up.label: Continue to Breast Feed

follow_up.name: malaria_measles
follow_up.label: Follow up after hospital visit

follow_up.name: malaria_measles_mild
follow_up.label: Advise mother when to return immediately
follow_up.danger: {{calculates.med_danger_malaria() == "danger" || calculates.med_danger_pneumonia() == "danger" || calculates.low_danger_pneumonia() == "danger"  || calculates.med_danger_malaria() == "danger" || calculates.low_danger_malaria() == "danger" || calculates.med_danger_dehydration() == "danger" || calculates.low_danger_dehydration() == "danger" || calculates.med_danger_malnut() == "danger" || calculates.med_danger_anemia() == "danger" ? "danger" : "good"}}

follow_up.name: pneumonia_med
follow_up.label: If wheezing (even if it disappeared after rapidly acting bronchodilator) give an inhaled bronhodilator for 5 days

follow_up.name: pneumonia_med2
follow_up.label: Soothe the throat and relieve the cough with a safe remedy

follow_up.name: pneumonia_med3
follow_up.label: If coughing for more than 3 weeks or if having recurrent wheezing, refer for assessment for TB or asthma

follow_up.name: pneumonia_med5
follow_up.label: Follow up in 2 days

follow_up.name: pneumonia_low
follow_up.label: If wheezing (even if it disappeared after rapidly acting bronchodilator) give an inhaled bronhodilator for 5 days

follow_up.name: pneumonia_low2
follow_up.label: Soothe the throat and relieve the cough with a safe remedy

follow_up.name: pneumonia_low3
follow_up.label: If coughing for more than 3 weeks or if having recurrent wheezing, refer for assessment for TB or asthma

follow_up.name: pneumonia_low5
follow_up.label: Follow up in 5 days if not improving
follow_up.danger: {{(calculates.low_danger_pneumonia() == "danger" || calculates.med_danger_dehydration() == "danger" || calculates.med_danger_ear() == "danger" || calculates.low_danger_dehydration() == "danger" || calculates.med_danger_diarrhea() == "danger") && !(calculates.severe_classification() == "danger" || calculates.high_danger_diarrhea() == "danger" || calculates.med_danger_pneumonia() == "danger" || calculates.danger_dysentry()== "danger" || calculates.med_danger_measles() == "danger"  || calculates.med_danger_malaria() == "danger" || calculates.low_danger_malaria() == "danger") ? "danger" : "good"}}

follow_up.name: ear_med
follow_up.label: Give paracetamol for pain

follow_up.name: ear_med2
follow_up.label: Dry the ear by wicking

follow_up.name: malaria_med2
follow_up.label: Follow up in 2 days if fever persists

follow_up.name: malaria_med3
follow_up.label: If fever is present every day for more than 7 days, refer for assesment

follow_up.name: malaria_low2
follow_up.label: Follow up in 2 days if fever persists

follow_up.name: malaria_low3
follow_up.label: If fever is present every day for more than 7 days, refer for assesment

follow_up.name: measles_med
follow_up.label: If mouth ulcers, treat with gentian violet

follow_up.name: measles_low
follow_up.label: Give Vitamin A treatment

follow_up.name: dehydration_high_only
follow_up.label: Give fluid for severe dehydration

follow_up.name: dehydration_med
follow_up.label: Give fluid, zinc supplements, and food for some dehydration

follow_up.name: dehydration_low
follow_up.label: Give fluid, zinc supplements, and food to treat diarrhea at home

follow_up.name: malnut_med
follow_up.label: Asses the child's feeding and counsel the mother on feeding according o the feeding recommendations

follow_up.name: malnut_med3
follow_up.label: Follow up in 30 days
follow_up.danger: {{calculates.med_danger_malnut() == "danger" && !(calculates.med_danger_anemia() == "danger" || calculates.low_danger_pneumonia() == "danger" || calculates.med_danger_dehydration() == "danger" || calculates.med_danger_ear() == "danger" || calculates.low_danger_dehydration() == "danger" || calculates.med_danger_diarrhea() == "danger" ||calculates.severe_classification() == "danger" || calculates.high_danger_diarrhea() == "danger" || calculates.med_danger_pneumonia() == "danger" || calculates.danger_dysentry()== "danger" || calculates.med_danger_measles() == "danger"  || calculates.med_danger_malaria() == "danger" || calculates.low_danger_malaria() == "danger") ? "danger" : "good"}}

follow_up.name: anemia_med
follow_up.label: Give Iron

follow_up.name: anemia_med2
follow_up.label: Give oral antimalarial if high malaria risk

follow_up.name: anemia_med3
follow_up.label: Give mebendazole if child is 1 year or older and has not had a dose in the previous six months

follow_up.name: anemia_med5
follow_up.label: Follow up in 14 days
follow_up.danger: {{calculates.med_danger_anemia() == "danger" && !(calculates.low_danger_pneumonia() == "danger" || calculates.med_danger_dehydration() == "danger" || calculates.med_danger_ear() == "danger" || calculates.low_danger_dehydration() == "danger" || calculates.med_danger_diarrhea() == "danger" || calculates.severe_classification() == "danger" || calculates.high_danger_diarrhea() == "danger"|| calculates.med_danger_pneumonia() == "danger" || calculates.danger_dysentry()== "danger" || calculates.med_danger_measles() == "danger"  || calculates.med_danger_malaria() == "danger" || calculates.low_danger_malaria() == "danger") ? "danger" : "good"}}

follow up.name: diarrhea_med
follow up.label: Advise the mother on feeding a child who has persistent diarrhea

follow up.name: diarrhea_med2
follow up.label: Give multivitamins and minerals (including zinc) for 14 days
